hey guys it's angel I am back in the

and we're gonna be doing what I love

Korea and it's basically instant coffee
whipped together with equal parts sugar
and hot water now whip coffee itself is
not actually new there's a similar drink
from India but since we are boba Reese's
for the day I'm going to be showing you
how to make a whipped coffee bubble tea
and since this recipe is so fun to make
I'm super excited to make it let's jump
right in and get started shall we all
right for the first part of the drink
we're gonna be making the whipped
instant coffee topping and for that
we'll need three simple ingredients
the first is two tablespoons of instant
coffee and you can use whatever instant
coffee that you like two tablespoons of
organic cane sugar and two tablespoons
of hot water so we'll start by adding
two tablespoons of instant coffee and
I'm using a dark instant coffee next
I'll add in my cane sugar and finally
two tablespoons of hot water now for the
fun part you can use a hand mixer or you
can use a whisk
I recommend the hand mixer because
you're gonna be able to do this in just

so we'll start with a couple spoonfuls

tea so guys feel free to go crazy and

next a couple of cubes of ice then
enough milk to fill the glass about 3/4
full I'm using coconut milk but you can

we'll be adding the whipped coffee
topping enough so it looks like a

for style points
finally to top everything off a pinch or
two of the chocolate shavings makes this

straw to make you smile and that guys is
how you make whip coffee bubble tea once
